text: 25yrs ago today Thatcher threw in the towel and decided not to context the 2nd round of the leadership election.
@majorsrise Too little too late ... and on the 22nd Nov MT threw in the towel and it was all over ... Can't believe it was 25yrs ago!

25yrs ago today (20th Nov) MT won the 1st ballot in the Tory party leadership election. She fell short of enough to win outright, however.
